title: Maize Seedling Detection Dataset (MSDD): A Curated High-Resolution RGB Dataset for Seedling Maize Detection and Benchmarking with YOLOv9, YOLO11, YOLOv12 and Faster-RCNN
summary: This paper introduces MSDD, a high-quality aerial image dataset for maize seedling stand counting, crucial for precision agriculture. It addresses the scarcity of curated datasets for accurate maize seedling detection, with applications in early-season crop monitoring, yield prediction, and in-field management.
usefulness_reason: The paper introduces a "curated high-resolution RGB dataset" for "maize seedling detection" and "stand counting". This directly relates to "Contextual dataset" and potentially "Survey data" in the context of agricultural monitoring. While not a spatio-temporal point process, it's a relevant dataset.
